description.narrative: Output 1.2. By 2025, the Government and stakeholders at national and subnational level will have an increased capacity to expand and sustainably provide, while families and communities will have an increased capacity to demand, an essential package of quality preventative, promotive and curative services for infants and young children in development and humanitarian situations, and urban settings

mailing-address.narrative: Plot 9 George Street PO Box 7047 Kampala

sector.narrative: Child health policy advocacy, evidence generation, national / subnational capacity development
HSS - Health sector policy, planning and governance at national or sub-national levels
Public health emergencies, including disease outbreaks

title.narrative: Uganda United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
Uganda 2018 Annual Report on Results for Children
Uganda 2019 Annual Report on Results for Children
Uganda 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 1.2. By 2025, the Government and stakeholders at national and subnational level will have an increased capacity to expand and sustainably provide, while families and communities will have an increased capacity to demand, an essential package of quality preventative, promotive and curative services for infants and young children in development and humanitarian situations, and urban settings
